verbs.description: [ARG1: Three American citizens] [V: detained] [ARGM-LOC: in North Korea] have been released , according to a tweet by President Donald Trump .
Three American citizens detained in North Korea [V: have] been released , according to a tweet by President Donald Trump .
Three American citizens detained in North Korea have [V: been] released , according to a tweet by President Donald Trump .
[ARG1: Three American citizens detained in North Korea] have been [V: released] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a tweet by President Donald Trump] .
Three American citizens detained in North Korea have been released , [V: according] to a tweet by President Donald Trump .
